metadata.title: CVE-2024-5701 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Memory safety bugs present in Firefox 126. Some of these bugs showedevidence of memory corruption and we presume that with enough effort someof these could have been exploited to run arbitrary code. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 127.

criterions.comment: mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
